meanings.definition: Thermoplastics: a type of plastic that becomes soft when heated and hard when cooled.
meanings.sent1: The thermoplastics in the toy melted in the sun.
meanings.sent2: The factory used thermoplastics to create new containers.
meanings.sent3: The thermoplastics decided to take a break and relax in the warm sun.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were as flexible as thermoplastics, adapting to any situation.
meanings.sent5: The colorful thermoplastics danced in the heat, changing shape with each step.

meanings.definition: Thermoplastics: materials that can be melted and reshaped multiple times.
meanings.sent1: The artist molded the thermoplastics into a beautiful sculpture.
meanings.sent2: Recycling centers often collect thermoplastics for reuse.
meanings.sent3: The thermoplastics threw a party every time they were reshaped.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were like thermoplastics, constantly evolving and adapting.
meanings.sent5: The thermoplastics transformed into different forms with each new design.
